Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん、 またお酒飲んでるんですか？
銘酒「ワンハンドレッドロンリー」よ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the famous "One Hundred Lonely."

Entry.JapaneseText: 血行がよくなって身体が温まるの。 雪国ならではの銘酒よ。
Entry.EnglishText: It improves circulation and keeps your body warm. It's a choice sake in snowy regions.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたし、匂いを嗅いだだけでも 気持ち悪くなっちゃいます……
Entry.EnglishText: Just smelling it is making me feel unwell...

Entry.JapaneseText: 未成年だし、お酒はまだ早いわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, you can't have sake yet because you're underage.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、診療所の消毒薬の匂いですら クラクラしちゃって……
Entry.EnglishText: But, even the disinfectant you find in medical clinics makes me feel woozy...
As a doctor, that has to be rough...
